title: Truth Gaming eSports LF new staff.
body:
Hey there, Truth Gaming are now looking for new staff for the upcoming project we have in the works.

We have hosted a couple of successful tournaments and are currently working on our next project.

The positions we currently have open are as follows:

-Social Media Manager
-Play-by-play Caster x2
-Color Caster x1

If you want more information, then you can either:

-Message me on discord at TG Kairutox #7287
-Message our Truth Gaming eSports Facebook page here https://www.facebook.com/TruthGamingEsports/
-Message my personal streaming facebook page here https://www.facebook.com/Kairutox/

replies.body:
Is this a friendly group up or pay job? 

A few tips. 

Do your research and type down what is needed for these roles. Like - type up an Actual Job ad. 

What you have up there is very little information, which suggest. inexperienced and casual attitude. I've seen these types of management before; it is doom to fail. Bad structures and poorly qualify personel. Big dream, little skills.
